verses.content: Aron naupasalhai pâwlhai chu hieng hi a nih: Aron naupa- salhai chu: Nadab, Abihu, Eleazar le Ithamar an nih.
Amiruokchu, Nadab le Abihu chu an pa nêkin an thi hmasa a, nau an nei nawh a; chuongchun, Eleazar le Ithamar chun thiempu sin chu an thawh tah a.
Chun, David chun an rawng- bâwlnaa an sinthaw ang peiin, Zadok, Eleazar nauhai le, Ahimelek, Ithamar nauhai chu a ṭheh a.

Ithamar naupasalhai laia nêk chun Eleazar naupasalhai laia chun hotu tam lem hmu a na; chuong ang chun ṭhe an na; Eleazar naupasalhai pahnam luhai chu sâwm le paruk an na, Ithamar naupasalhai chu an pahnam ang peiin pariet an nih.
Chun, aisâna ṭhe an na, chi dân dang dangin, Ithamar naupasalhai le Eleazar naupasalhai laia chun Pathien in hotuhai le hmun inthienga hotuhai chu an um ve ve sih a.

Chun, Nethanel naupa ziektu Semaia chun lal le, rorêltuhai le, thiempu Zadok le, Abiathar naupa Ahimelek le, Levi mihai le thiempu chihai pahnam luhai hmaa chun a ziek a; Eleazar ta dingin pahnam khat chan chu a tlu a; Ithamar ta dingin pahnam khat chan chu a tlu bawk a.
Chun, aisâna pakhatna chu Jehoiarib chungah a tlah a, a pahnina Jedaia chungah,
a pathumna Harim chungah, a palina Seorim chungah;
a pangana Malkija chungah, a parukna Mijamin chungah,
a pasarina Hakkoz chungah, a parietna Abija chungah,
a pakuona Jeshua chungah, a sâwmna Sekania chungah;
A sâwmpakhatna Eliasib chungah, a sâwmpahnina Jakim chungah.
A sâwmpathumna Huppa chungah, a sâwmpalina Jesebeab chungah,
A sâwmpangana Bilga chungah a sâwmparukna Immer chungah;
A sâwmpasarina Hezir chung- ah, a sâwmparietna Happizzez chungah.
A sâwmpakuona Pethahia chungah, a sâwmhnina Jehezekel chungah,
a sâwmhni pakhatna Jakin chungah, a sâwmhni pahnina Gamul chungah;
A sâwmhni pathumna Delaia chungah, a sâwmhni palina Maazia chungah,
LALPA Israelhai Pathienin ama thu a pêk anga, an thlatu Aron hmanga dân a pêk ang taka, LALPA ina rawngbâwl dinga an hung dân dinga, an rawngbâwlnaa an indawt dân chu a nih.
Chun, Levi naupasal danghai chungthua chu: Amram naupasalhai laiah Subael, Subael naupasalhai laiah Jedeia,
Rehabia thlaah: Rehabia nau- pasalhai laiah Issia a hotu.
Izhar mia chun Selomoth; Selomoth naupasalhai laia chun Jahath.
Chun, Hebron naupasalhaia chun: a hotu tak Jeria, a pa- hnina chu Amaria, a pathumna chu Jahaziel, a palina chu Jeka- meam.
Uzziel naupasalhaia chun Mika; Mika naupasalhaia chun Samir.
Mika unaupa chu Issia; Issia naupasalhaia chun Zekaria.
Merari naupasalhai chu Mahli le Musi; Jaazia naupasalhaia chun Beno;
Merari naupasala Jaazia nau- pasalhai chu: Beno, Soham, Zakkur le Ibri.
Mahli naupasal chu: Eleazar, naupasal hrim neilo chu.
Kis naupasal chu: Jerahmeel.
Chun, Musi naupasalhai chu: Mahli, Eder le Jerimoth. An pahnam ang peia Levi naupasalhai laia lusahai chu hienghai hi an nih.

Hieng hai khawm hin an unau Aron naupasalhai ang bawkin, lal David, Zadok, Ahimelek, Levi mihai le thiempu pahnam luhai hmaah, an unau naupang lemhai le thlatuhai khawm inthuruolin ai chu sân a ni veh a.
